biotools.summary: eProbalign computes maximal expected accuracy multiple sequence alignments from partition function posterior probabilities. eProbalign also provides a platform to visualize the alignment, generate images, and manipulate the output.

bioschemas.name: eProbalign
bioschemas.summary: eProbalign computes maximal expected accuracy multiple sequence alignments from partition function posterior probabilities. eProbalign also provides a platform to visualize the alignment, generate images, and manipulate the output.
